title: How to Take Care of an LBP Sackboy Plush or Creature

steps.headline: Do you want to know where to buy one of these LBP sackboy plushes or know what they are?
Okay,so first pick out the plush or stuffed animal you want to take care of!
Now, you need to know what to feed it.
steps.description: You want it to be healthy,right? So don't feed it junk food everyday! So maybe instead of feeding it on chips and burgers, use fruits, fish, salad, etc.

steps.headline: Let it get used to the house or, your pets!
steps.description: DON'T leave it on the floor!!! If you have more, older stuffed creatures or animals let them meet and become  best friends.

steps.headline: DON'T be mean to it, and treat it badly!!
steps.description: !That's not nice!! Don't forget about them or throw them around that would make them feel unloved and they might run away

steps.headline: Make it a bed or home!!
steps.description: !Don't let it be homeless. If you can't make it a house that's okay just at least  try  and make it a bed, if not then just let it sleep with you

steps.headline: If it has any tears, ask an adult to sew it up!
steps.description: If they can't then just put a bandage on it.

steps.headline: DON'T forget about them!!!
steps.description: If you do they might run away and that wouldn't be good now would it? So don't forget about them

steps.headline: LOVE them!
steps.description: All you need to do is LOVE them and never stop loving them

text: Do you want to know where to buy one of these LBP sackboy plushes or know what they are?  Okay,so first pick out the plush or stuffed animal you want to take care of!  Give it a name!  Now, you need to know what to feed it. You want it to be healthy,right? So don't feed it junk food everyday! So maybe instead of feeding it on chips and burgers, use fruits, fish, salad, etc. Let it get used to the house or, your pets! DON'T leave it on the floor!!! If you have more, older stuffed creatures or animals let them meet and become  best friends. DON'T be mean to it, and treat it badly!! !That's not nice!! Don't forget about them or throw them around that would make them feel unloved and they might run away Make it a bed or home!! !Don't let it be homeless. If you can't make it a house that's okay just at least  try  and make it a bed, if not then just let it sleep with you If it has any tears, ask an adult to sew it up! If they can't then just put a bandage on it. DON'T forget about them!!! If you do they might run away and that wouldn't be good now would it? So don't forget about them LOVE them! All you need to do is LOVE them and never stop loving them
